    • set_oscillation_range

      public void set_oscillation_range(float pMin, float pMax)
      set output value range of oscillator in minimum and maximum. this method affects the oscillatorâ€™s amplitude and offset. this methods can be particularily helpful when using an oscillator for non-audio applications ( e.g as an LFO that controlls the frequency ).
      Parameters:
      pMin - minimum value of oscillator
      pMax - maximum value of oscillator
